title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Mobile Microlearning—Multimedia Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex mathematical concepts with 80% accuracy using multimedia materials (videos, interactive graphs, etc.).
Learners apply self-directed learning strategies to solve math problems at least three times weekly in mobile environments.
Learners engage in constructivist problem-solving processes at least three times through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
